pkgmetadata.longdescription: Classification Accuracy and Consistency under Item Response Theory // Computes classification accuracy and consistency indices under Item Response Theory. Implements the total score IRT-based methods in Lee, Hanson Brennen (2002) and Lee (2010), the IRT-based methods in Rudner (2001, 2005), and the total score nonparametric methods in Lathrop Cheng (2014). For dichotomous and polytomous tests.
